metadata.name: Hello, Stranger
metadata.description:
Call it a day!

Yamada stops and sits on the bridge to enjoy the Bento  for dinner during the way back home

Suddenly, the sparrow flies to him and stops by his side

"Such a long tiring day, isn't it?" 

"I think you might need some!"

Yama-kun shares one Onigiri to the sparrow, so he can boost his energy and go back to the flock

They enjoy having a little conversation of what they have met today

Seems like they get along together very well and promise to see each other again on the other days!

At least on his tiring day, Yamada gets a new friend whom he can share his stories with ðŸ™‚

.
